GetParent.name: GetParent
GetParent.description: Returns the parent ApiCharacters object of the specified font.

GetBold.name: GetBold
GetBold.description: Returns the bold property of the specified font.

SetBold.name: SetBold
SetBold.description: Sets the bold property to the specified font.

params.name: isBold
params.description: Specifies that the text characters are displayed bold.

GetItalic.name: GetItalic
GetItalic.description: Returns the italic property of the specified font.

SetItalic.name: SetItalic
SetItalic.description: Sets the italic property to the specified font.

params.name: isItalic
params.description: Specifies that the text characters are displayed italic.

GetSize.name: GetSize
GetSize.description: Returns the font size property of the specified font.

SetSize.name: SetSize
SetSize.description: Sets the font size property to the specified font.

GetStrikethrough.name: GetStrikethrough
GetStrikethrough.description: Returns the strikethrough property of the specified font.

SetStrikethrough.name: SetStrikethrough
SetStrikethrough.description: Sets the strikethrough property to the specified font.

params.name: isStrikethrough
params.description: Specifies that the text characters are displayed strikethrough.

GetUnderline.name: GetUnderline
GetUnderline.description: Returns the type of underline applied to the specified font.

SetUnderline.name: SetUnderline
SetUnderline.description: Sets an underline of the type specified in the request to the current font.

GetSubscript.name: GetSubscript
GetSubscript.description: Returns the subscript property of the specified font.

SetSubscript.name: SetSubscript
SetSubscript.description: Sets the subscript property to the specified font.

params.name: isSubscript
params.description: Specifies that the text characters are displayed subscript.

GetSuperscript.name: GetSuperscript
GetSuperscript.description: Returns the superscript property of the specified font.

SetSuperscript.name: SetSuperscript
SetSuperscript.description: Sets the superscript property to the specified font.

params.name: isSuperscript
params.description: Specifies that the text characters are displayed superscript.

GetName.name: GetName
GetName.description: Returns the font name property of the specified font.

SetName.name: SetName
SetName.description: Sets the font name property to the specified font.

GetColor.name: GetColor
GetColor.description: Returns the font color property of the specified font.

SetColor.name: SetColor
SetColor.description: Sets the font color property to the specified font.

comment:
/**
	 * Class that contains the font attributes (font name, font size, color, and so on).
	 * @constructor
	 * @property {ApiCharacters} Parent - The parent object of the specified font object.
	 * @property {boolean | null} Bold - The font bold property.
	 * @property {boolean | null} Italic - The font italic property.
	 * @property {number | null} Size - The font size property.
	 * @property {boolean | null} Strikethrough - The font strikethrough property.
	 * @property {string | null} Underline - The font type of underline.
	 * @property {boolean | null} Subscript - The font subscript property.
	 * @property {boolean | null} Superscript - The font superscript property.
	 * @property {string | null} Name - The font name.
	 * @property {ApiColor | null} Color - The font color property.
	 */
description: Class that contains the font attributes (font name, font size, color, and so on).

properties.name: Parent
properties.description: The parent object of the specified font object.
